headline: Xylem Acquires Majority Stake in Idrica to Empower Water Utilities With Intelligent Solutions
summary: WASHINGTON, D.C., December 10, 2024--Xylem has announced that it has acquired a majority stake in Idrica, a leader in water data management and analytics.
